Drug Quiz Drug Quiz (%1$d/%2$d) There are several questions on this page to test your knowledge and understanding of drugs. The relevant answers can be found in the information office. \n\nSelect the answer from the options given. Each time you get an answer correct, you advance to the next question.\n\nIf you get the answer wrong, your game ends! You can return to the title screen using up or back from within the game screen, and this will also end your game. Get Start! activity_quiz_main Submit Try Again Next Match Congratulations!
